title: Tell me about The AI Slide Deck for Dean...

messages.content: Tell me about The AI Slide Deck for Dean Houston

The AI Slide Deck for Dean Houston contains a total of 25 slides, covering various topics related to AI technologies, image generation, and ethical scenarios.

1. **Slide Structure**: The presentation has slides on different aspects of AI, covering topics like text-based LLMs, AI video and image generation, AI audio capabilities, and several ethical scenarios at both employee and company levels [1], [2], [3], [4], [5].

2. **AI Video and Audio**: Slides 14 to 16 discuss the journey and advancements in AI video and audio generation. This includes technologies such as text-to-speech and AI voices, as well as applications like automated secretaries and music generation [1].

3. **Ethical Scenarios**: Slides 17 to 24 detail various ethical scenarios related to AI use in companies. These scenarios cover issues like data privacy, unvetted code, algorithmic bias, workplace surveillance, and image generation biases. For example, slide 20 highlights issues with AI workplace surveillance, noting how it led to privacy complaints and a national discussion [1], [3].

4. **Image Generation and Bias**: Slides 21 to 24 focus on bias in AI image generation, showcasing how current systems may not accurately reflect diversity, particularly in roles such as CEOs where image generators predominantly depict white males unless specified otherwise [3].

In summary, this presentation provides a detailed look into the capabilities and ethical considerations of AI, with particular emphasis on its application in business and its broader societal implications.

## SLIDE 17 ##

CONTENT:
Ethical Scenarios: Employee Level
Scenario 1: Company Secrets
Late at night, a junior marketing associate pasted the secret specs for next quarter's flagship product into public ChatGPT to create a press release much faster then they could write one themselves. The models draft looks great, until a rival blog published similar details the following week. ChatGPT can and will train on data submitted by free accounts!
sora

IMAGES:
Image 1:
  Description: a man sitting at a desk with a laptop
  Text content: RIVAL BLOG

@ ChatGPT
Press Release


## SLIDE 18 ##

CONTENT:
Ethical Scenarios: Employee Level
Scenario 2: Unvetted Code
Under intense deadline pressure from higher-ups, a developer let github copilot autogenerate a payment processing module and merged it without the usual license or security checks. Two months later, a routine audit revealed snippets lifted from GPL code and a latent vulnerability that exposed customer credit cards. One saved deadline has become a costly remediation nightmare.
sora

IMAGES:
Image 1:
  Description: a man sitting at a desk with a laptop and a clock
  Text content: Payment
Module


## SLIDE 19 ##

CONTENT:
Ethical Scenarios: Company Level
Scenario 1: Algorithmic Bias Detection
Your company's HR department has implemented an LLM that assists with reviewing job applications. After several months, an employee notices that the system seems to prioritize candidates from certain educational and racial backgrounds and consistently ranks others lower, despite similar or even identical qualifications. If this gets out lawsuits will ensue for discrimination against protected class.
sora

IMAGES:
Image 1:
  Description: a man holding a magnit


## SLIDE 20 ##

CONTENT:
Ethical Scenarios: Company Level
Scenario 2: AI Workplace Surveillance Goes Too Far
Eager to boost efficiency, the executive team rolled out an AI powered camera system that supposedly just tracked safety incidents on the factory floor. Within weeks, the software began ranking individual "idle time" and piping the scores straight into the performance dashboards—leading managers to discipline staff for longer water-cooler chats. This triggered a huge drop in job satisfaction and a slew of workforce-wide privacy complaints that was quickly picked up by the press, becoming a national discussion-point.

IMAGES:
Image 1:
  Description: a group of people standing in front of a large screen
  Text content: IDLE TIME SCORES


## SLIDE 21 ##

messages.content: Show me the Dean Houston Logo
The Dean Houston logo can be seen in the image labeled [Image 1], which is captioned as "the logo for dean houston." This image is available for viewing and download.
A relevant image of a rhino is available in [Image 1], captioned as "a white rhino and her calf in the wild." This image can be viewed and downloaded.
